content.text: This website was built using NextJS, a javascript framwork based on React. Styling was done using no template, but rather custom CSS combined with TailwindCSS. The website is hosted on Vercel, which also provides the CI/CD pipeline for the project.

If you find any errors or issues with the website, please report them to me via the following link. I will try to fix them as soon as possible. I also appreciate any feedback on the website design or content.

If you are interested in the technical details of a specific project or want to know more about my work, feel free to reach out to me. I am always happy to discuss my projects and share insights into the development process. I'm also inviting you checking out my GitHub profile for more projects and contributions.
